title: Mastery Course in Academic Writing for Prospective Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science experiment design and data collection experience
context.additional_context: Online education program for prospective science teachers to systematically acquire research paper writing skills. Features modular design aligned with individual progress and peer-review-based feedback system

learning_goals: Students can organize the standard structure of scientific education research papers (introduction-methods-results-discussion) with 90% accuracy

Learners can accurately cite over 10 references in APA 7th edition format without errors and submit a report that meets all five checklist items (author, publication year, title, source, format) provided at submission.

By synthesizing three peer feedbacks and one instructor evaluation, learners can assess a research paper to achieve a score of 4 or higher on a 5-point rubric scale in terms of validity (research design, data interpretation) and scientific rigor (methodology, references).
Students can fully perform the research paper writing process (100%) using digital tools provided by online LMS platforms, such as reference management software
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
